akn:section.akn:heading: Liability for acts of officers and agents

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 70111. Liability for acts of officers and agents The corporation is liable for the acts of its officers and agents acting within the scope of their authority. (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1349.)
Historical and Revision Notes
